sentences.sentence: Until a few months ago few people outside the arcane world of contemporary music had heard of Gorecki.
sentences.translation: 直至几个月前，现代音乐神秘世界之外只有少数人听说过戈莱斯基。

sentences.sentence: MARChas always been an arcane standard.
sentences.translation: MARC从来都是一个神秘的标准。

sentences.sentence: It was an arcane dispute over tariffs.
sentences.translation: 这是一场关于关税的神秘争斗。
